revisions.rev:
{{Infobox Television |show_name = Nuestra Belleza Latina 2009 | image = |format = [[Reality television|Reality]]
[[Game Show]] |runtime = 60 minutes |starring = [[Giselle Blondet]] |judges =[[Osmel Sousa]]
[[Lupita Jones]]
[[Jorge Aravena]] |country = [[United States]] |network = [[Univision]] |first_aired = March 1, 2009 |last_aired = May 17, 2009 |num_episodes = 12 | preceded_by = [[Nuestra Belleza Latina 2008]] |followed_by = [[Nuestra Belleza Latina 2010]] |website = http://www.univision.com/content/channel.jhtml?chid=10&schid=10753 Nuestra Belleza Latina - Official Page }} '''Nuestra Belleza Latina 2009''' is the third season of [[Nuestra Belleza Latina]] (Our Latin Beauty) premiered on March 2009. Auditions were once again held in five major US cities (Los Angeles, California; Dallas, Texas; Miami, Florida; Chicago, Illinois; and New York City, New York) and in San Juan, Puerto Rico. During the audition process, 75 young women were given passes to the semi-finals in Miami, Florida. With the twist of adding one more contestant named "La Intrusa" (Francheska Mattei). For several weeks, Francheska Mattei, a professional actress, posed as one of the contestants to know the rumors, secrets, and even gossip from the girls. The elimination process was quick, with 15 women leaving the first day, 40 on the second week, and finally, on tba, 8 women were eliminated leaving the 12 finalists who will be moving into a Miami mansion were they will be living together for the rest of the competition. Each week, viewers will have a chance to vote for their favorite finalists. The three women with the least number of votes will then be in danger of being eliminated. However, two of the women in the bottom three will have the chance of being saved, one by her fellow finalists, and the other by the judges. This year they had an "Intrusa", the one that spilled the gossip about the contestants and it was Puerto Rican, Francheska Mattei. [[Greydis Gil]] contestant representing [[Cuba]] won the competition. ==Changes== There were some mayor changes to this Season, [[Julian Gil]] left the show, and was replaced with Model/Actor [[Jorge Aravena]]. [[Osmel Sousa]] and [[Lupita Jones]] became the main Judges. [[Melissa Marty]] became a correspondent in the show, she went backstage and had a one-on-one with the girls during the Show and at the "Belleza House". The show moved from Tuesdays to Sundays at 8pm/7c. For the first time in '''Nuestra Belleza Latina''' history a girl was expelled. Contestant, '''Stephanie''' broke the main rule of '''Nuestra Belleza Latina''' of having contact with an outside member. The contestant was soon replaced by '''Chastelyn'''. ==Judges== *[[Osmel Sousa]] *[[Lupita Jones]] *[[Jorge Aravena]] ==Elimination chart==

Audition Place |- | Greydis Gil | '''Miami''' |- | Marycarmen LÃ³pez | '''Los Angeles''' |- | Catalina LÃ³pez | '''Chicago''' |- | MÃ³nica De LeÃ³n | '''Houston''' |- | Janice Bencosme | '''Miami''' |- | Berenice GuzmÃ¡n | '''Los Angeles''' |- | Monica Pastrana | '''Los Angeles''' |- | Jennifer Andrade | '''NY''' |- | Stephanie Figueroa | '''Puerto Rico''' |- | Susie de los Santos | '''Chicago''' |- | Anna Valencia | '''Miami''' |- | Vanessa Lotero | '''Los Angeles''' |- | Chastelyn Rodriguez | '''Puerto Rico''' |} ==Season 3, Episode 2: The Envelopes== Original Air Dateâ8 March 2009 The 75 selected contestants arrive to Miami. 20 of them receive an envelope the very first day. 10 of them are eliminated. ==Season 3, Episode 3: The Coaches Eliminate== Original Air Dateâ15 March 2009 The Choreography, Diction and Runway coaches cut 15 more girls from the group. The remaining 50 girls have to show their best talent onstage. After the performance, the show judges eliminate another 10 contestants. ==Season 3, Episode 4: Group Task== Original Air Dateâ22 March 2009 The 41 remaining girls are divided in groups to perform onstage. Four groups have musical numbers and the other four acting scenes. At the end of the show, the judges eliminate 20 girls. ==Season 3, Episode 5: Revealing the Mole== Original Air Dateâ29 March 2009 The mole is revealed and the 20 remaining girls face the judges one more time to receive their final evaluation. 12 of them are named finalists and go to the next stage of the show. The rest of the girls are eliminated. '''The Final 12 are Chosen:''' {|class="wikitable" |- ! Contestant ! Country Representing |- | Greydis Gil | '''Cuba''' |- | Marycarmen Lopez | '''Mexico''' |- | Catalina Lopez | '''Ecuador''' |- | MÃ³nica De LeÃ³n | '''Mexico''' |- | Janice Bencosme | '''Republica Dominicana''' |- | Berenize Guzman | '''Mexico''' |- | Monica Pastrana | '''Puerto Rico''' |- | Jennifer Andrade | '''Mexico''' |- | bgcolor="red"| Stephanie Figueroa | '''Puerto Rico''' |- | Susie De Los Santos | '''Mexico''' |- | Anna Valencia | '''Mexico''' |- | Jannet Manzanarez | '''Colombia''' |- |} {|class="wikitable" |- ! Replacement ! Country Representing |- | bgcolor="FF9966"| Chastelyn Rodriguez | '''Puerto Rico''' |} ==Season 3, Episode 6: No Make-up Photoshoot== Original Air Dateâ5 April 2009 The 12 finalists move to the mansion, where they start training while they are tested every day. The first challenge of the season is a no-make up photo-shoot. The winner will appear in People En EspaÃ±ol magazine (as part of the 50 most beautiful edition). ==Season 3, Episode 7: Hurricane Report== Original Air Dateâ12 April 2009 The 11 remaining girls have to endure the hardest challenge of the season, reporting on location while a Hurricane hits the city with winds up to 100 miles per hour. ==Season 3, Episode 8: The Rope Course== Original Air Dateâ19 April 2009 The 10 remaining girls have to compete in a challenging rope course, where they have to be the fastest and the smartest in order to win. ==Season 3, Episode 9: Tarantula Photo Shoot== Original Air Dateâ26 April 2009 The 9 remaining girls face another breathtaking challenge. They have to pose for a print ad with a live tarantula walking over their shoulders, hands and face. ==Season 3, Episode 10: Novela Scenes== Original Air Dateâ3 May 2009 The 8 remaining girls are paired to do a sequenced telenovela scene, live onstage. The three girls in danger of elimination answer questions while connected at a lie detector machine. ==Season 3, Episode 11: The Final Question== Original Air Dateâ10 May 2009 The 7 remaining girls face the judges to hear them read the crudest critiques the audience posted online. They are challenge to respond to those critics -live- as if they were part of an interview. ==Season 3, Episode 12: The Finale 2009== Original Air Dateâ17 May 2009 The 6 finalists chosen by the popular vote hit the runway for the last time. The one with the most votes is crowned "Miss Nuestra Belleza Latina 2009" '''Winner:''' [[Greydis Gil]] ===Orden de llamados=== {|class="wikitable" |+Llamados de Giselle |- !rowspan=2|Order!!colspan=13|Episodes |- !Top 12 !1 !2 !3 !width="50"|4 !width="50"|5 !width="50"|6 !colspan=4|7(Finale) !bgcolor="Red"|Top 2 |- ! 13 | bgcolor="darkgreen"|Francheska|| style="background:#CCCCCC;" colspan="11" | |} {|class="wikitable" !Color !Description !Used |- |{{colorbox|#EE82EF}} |The contestant was eliminated |Week 1-7 |- |{{colorbox|#32CD32}} |The contestant won the competition |Top 2 |- |{{colorbox|lightpink}} |The contestant won second place |Top 2 |- |{{colorbox|darkred}} |The contestant was expelled by the panel |Top 12 |- |{{colorbox|gold}} |The contestant replaced the expelled Contestant |Week 1 |- |{{colorbox|darkgreen}} |The mole (La Intrusa) A contestant who was put in by the producers |Top 12 |- |{{colorbox|lightsteelblue}} |The contestant won the challenge of the week |Week 1-7 |- |{{colorbox|Purple}} |The contestant won the challenge of the week but was eliminated |Week 4 |- |} ===Contestants Notes=== *{{flagicon|Ecuador}} [[Catalina Lopez]] competed in [[Miss Ecuador 2006]] where she won. She later represented Ecuador at [[Miss Universe 2006]] in Los Angeles. She didn't classified as semifinalist. Then she represented Ecuador at the [[Miss Continente Americano]] 2006, where she finished in the Top 6. *{{flagicon|Puerto Rico}} [[Monica Pastrana]] competed in [[Miss Puerto Rico 2009]] where she landed a spot in the Top 20. She represented Puerto Rico at [[Miss International 2009]] in China. She didn't classified as semifinalist. ==External links== * [http://www.univision.com/content/channel.jhtml?chid=10&schid=10753 Nuestra Belleza Latina - Official Page] {{es icon}} ==References== * [http://www.univision.com/content/channel.jhtml?chid=10&schid=10753 Nuestra Belleza Latina at Univision.com] {{es icon}} *{{imdb title|1043861|Nuestra Belleza Latina}} * [[^]]''Greidys Gil Wins Nuestra Belleza Latina 2009'' [http://www.univision.com/content/channel.jhtml?chid=9486&schid=9487&secid=16181] * [[^]]''Marycarmen becomes runner-up'' [http://www.latingossip.com/television/greydis-gil-wins-nuestra-belleza-latina-2009.html] * [[^]]''En Busca de Nuestra Belleza Latina 2010'' [http://blog.newsok.com/.../2010/.../univision-seeks-nuestra-belleza-latina-%20contestants] * [[^]]''Episodios de nuestra belleza_latina'' [http://www.hispanicprwire.com/news.php?l=in&id=1110] ==Winners== {{start box}} {{succession box|title=''Nuestra Belleza Latina 2009''|before=[[Melissa Marty]]|after=[[Ana Patricia GonzÃ¡lez]]|-[[Nuestra Belleza Latina 2010]]|years='''[[Greydis Gil]]'''}} {{end box}} [[Category:Univision network shows]] [[es:Nuestra belleza latina]] {{Nuestra Belleza Latina}} {{Contestants of Nuestra Belleza Latina}}
